data.title: What would be a prime example of a Western movie, where the native Americans are portrayed as "bad" or "evil"?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 5): There are lots and lots of movies that show Indians with sympathy. But not all. Here are a few of the most common criticisms.

→Indian characters being played by non-Indian actors. Here’s Mel Brooks and Johnny Depp. Mel Brook was play the role for schtick. Johnny Depp has no excu...
